mapper.select: select bb.*, cast(timestampdiff(minute, bb.pRdate, now())/60 as signed integer) as diffTime from Product bb order by pId desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
mapper.insert: insert into product values (default, #{vo.pName}, #{vo.pCate}, #{vo.pPrice}, default, #{vo.pStock}, #{vo.pImage}, #{vo.pContent}, default, default, default, default);
